attributes.review: I thought that by downloading this app I would help our ~exquisite~ president, only to have him commit black fishing and push me out of the White House after taking my all my information and ss number. I was forced to build him a wall in the courtyard out of cheeto bangs and menstraual  products while he stole my arroz con pollo out of my lunch bag... 1 Star for me 😓
attributes.title: Stole my Arroz con Pollo

attributes.review: Now I’m all for supporting blue lives matter, (Dominos pizzas workers ofc) but Trump and all his little Trumpets made using this app very hard! First, it took a whole century to download which is highly inconvenient! Then when I joined the app, links to Pence and trump wattapad stories showed up! Extremely traumatic! Anyway, Stan charli Demelio for clear skin, stream Say So, and always remember BARBZ FOR BERNIE😁❤️🙈😹🧚🏻‍♀️✨😋
attributes.title: AWFUL APP🙄✌🏼

attributes.review: This app made me stupid. I don’t know what it is, but as soon as I started using this app my brain seemed foggy and I felt overcome with hatred and bigotry. I immediately ran outside and screamed racial slurs at my black neighbor. We have been friends for 25 years. When did I become a racist?? I immediately deleted the app. And now I feel fine :)
attributes.title: Zero stars

attributes.review: Not only did this app take forever to download but after i finally got it downloaded it corrupted my phone. All of my apps turned white and i couldn’t open any of them, made my phone look like it was going to a k k k meeting, must be programmed into the app. If i could i would rate this app a 0!
attributes.title: delete it immediately

attributes.review: this app was awful!!!!! i opened it and it immediately asked for my number. i don’t want to give them my personal information!!! i tried downloading it because i saw a video saying give him a chance. ok well i did my research and i’m DONE. i will not be voting for him in the 2020 election. having a racist cheeto as president is so embarrassing.
attributes.title: mad

attributes.review: The app took forever to download, even though my wifi is top notch. When it did finish downloading, it kept crashing and lagging so I figured I would delete it and then download it again, but to no avail. It still would not work. This is the worst app to ever exist and I would not recommend it to anyone.
attributes.title: TERRIBLEEE

attributes.review:
Took 5 MONTHS to download..DOWNLOAD, anyway I received a notification from the app that said that I was gonna get deported which makes no sense since I’m a citizen here🤡 I kept getting notifications that if I didn’t vote for trump I wouldn’t be able to have rights which is completely utterly insane and unfair...hate this app 
DO NOT DOWNLOAD I WOULD GIVE IT 0 STARS IF I COULD.
attributes.title: HATE THIS🤡

attributes.review: I was so excited for this app as everyone knows we must support our amazing non racist non homophobic president 🥳 but it took 55 weeks for this app to download and when opened it started playing “Say No To This” from Hamilton and then started shocking me repeatedly and I am just so dissatisfied ✌🏻🥺✌🏻✊🏻😞✊🏻
attributes.title: I wish this app had gone down with the Titanic✌🏻🥰✌🏻

attributes.review: I downloaded the app in order to stay in touch and it was fine at the start but it just began to glitch and it was opening randomly when my phone was on. I have to delete the app in order for the glitching to stop because it’s affecting the rest of my phone.
attributes.title: Glitching

attributes.review: This app is disgustingly slow & keeps making my phone freeze. I heard it takes all of your personal information and SELLS IT to other companies to market ads towards you. Awful. Basically an invasion of privacy and limits my right on saying what I want to say without worry of an ad popping up.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE.
